name: aliexpress.solution.schema.product.full.update
description: Schema interface for product full update. QPS(Invoke per second) for this API is limited to 100 for each appkey and 50 for each seller.

requestParams.name: schema_full_update_request
requestParams.description: Product full update request. To learn how to generate the content, please refer to https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=109760&docType=1.  Be aware that the aliexpress_product_id field should be replaced by the product ID belonged to the seller.

responseParams.name: product_id
responseParams.description: Product id that has been updated.
